data.title: Free Tuition
data.meta_description: At Mission College, we've undertaken a monumental shift. We've removed tuition costs for individuals residing in the West Valley-Mission College District service area. Yes, if you live in the districtâ€™s service area, you can now attend college without paying tuition. Your boundless future begins right here.
data.text:
What other options do I have if I don't qualify, and what are the requirements I must meet?

WVMCCD offers four ways to qualify for free-tuition at each of our campuses:

Enrollment Fee Grant (service area)

Mission Promise or Viking Promise

California College Promise Grant (CCPG)

Dual Enrollment

First and second year students who do not live in the service area may qualify via our College Promise programs. For more information, click on the following links:

WVC Viking Promise: https://www.westvalley.edu/community-grant/

Mission College Promise
